data.title: Distance from Magadan to Goroka
data.meta_description: Distance from Magadan to Goroka how many miles and kilometers, how far is it from Magadan to Goroka travel distance.
data.text:
The air travel (bird fly) shortest distance between Magadan and Goroka is 7,294 km= 4,532 miles.

If you travel with an airplane (which has average speed of 560 miles) from Magadan to Goroka, It takes 8.09 hours to arrive.
